medicaltest

Class XRayScanFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • medicaltest.MedicalTestFactory
      • medicaltest.XRayScanFactory

  • public class XRayScanFactory
extends MedicalTestFactory
    The Factory that creates an XRayScan This factory requires : A bodypart, a zoomlevel and the number of needed images.
